QA Engineer 

Understand the functionality being developed and create test specifications and use cases that will exercise the functionality at a component level and product level.

Designation: QA Engineer

Experience: - 2 years

Location: Jodhpur

About Us: Lucid Outsourcing Solutions,  an ISO 9001:2015 is an offshore web design and development solutions provider that operates through its corporate office at Jodhpur.

Job Description:

Understand the functionality being developed and create test specifications and use cases that will exercise the functionality at a component level and product level. 

Design framework and test scripts for UI automation 

Work closely with the product developers to understand the product requirements and features. 

Ability to meet aggressive product delivery schedules 

2- 4 years of experience in QA both Manual and Automated testing of web applications. 

Identification of the test scenarios,  test data and create test scripts 

Degree in Computer Science area or equivalent CTC -  Depends on Experience.
